reviewText: Awesome!! A powerful statement on the culture of Brazil and the young girls who beat the drums.  I would highly recommend this for anyone who is interested in the full cultural aspects of the country.  -Dee Carr

I love this documentary, the music in it is amazing and the culture is so rich and beautiful. I would highly recommended anyone interested in different cultures and traditions to check this dvd out, I absolutely love the music and I play it over and over.. The DVD does not have a lot of features and it's only 30mins, although the original documentary is about 45 mins long but it is worth it anyway.
